Summary: several small bright lights/ One large bright light / shimmering in the sky ... appeared ... disappeared ... appeared ... faded one by one ... appeared ,,, zig-zagged ... disappeared ???
divs: sighting detailsback in 1979 ... or 1980 ... (don't recall the exact date and time) ... a number of friends (15 or more) and myself ... had hiked up to the top of a hill \rock outcrop ... and were hanging out for some time ... this event occurred sometime around 5:00 pm or so ??? (near the end of the day anyway) as we are hanging out ... one of the girls next to me ... said something about lights in the sky ... and was she the only one who could see them ... she pointed out to the horizon ... i then saw them ... and said to her ... no ... your not the only one ... i see them too. i then tell the others to check out these lights. at first .. there were 3 small lights ... like stars ... low in the sky on the horizon ... shimmering ... just there ... suspended ??? then ... the one on the right disappeared ... a few seconds later ... the middle one disappeared ... then ... a few seconds later ... the left one disappeared. everyone was like ... what was that ??? then ... maybe 30 seconds later ... a much bigger brighter light appeared ... shimmering ... then ... a small light appeared to the right ... and a small light appeared to the left ... all shimmering ... like stars ... then the small ones disappeared ... and the bigger one began to slowly fade away ... from right to left ... until it was gone ??? once again ... we are all like ... what was that ??? ... as we tried to explain it ... maybe after 30 seconds or less ... off to the left of the original position of the lights in the sky ... we see 6 small lights ... just like the original ones ... in a pattern of 3 and 3 ... (3 side by side on the left ... 3 side by side on the right ... the right ones being slightly lower in the sky than the the other 3 on the left) ... shimmering ... suspended like ... after maybe 10 seconds or less ... these lights began to move in a zig-zag pattern ... in formation ... across the sky ... for several seconds ... and then ...just disappeared ??? ??? we were like ... what the heck ??? (and a few other words) we tried to explain it ??? plane? no ... no sound ? helicopter? no ... no sound ... lights to far apart? heat lightning ? no ... reflections of car lights from the highway onto the clouds? no ... only a few clouds in the sky ... here and there ??? granite rock creating sparks thrown up into the atmosphere? no ... ??? (that was a good one) try as we might ... we could not explain it. a little more information ... this occurred in the sky over the vermont yankee atomic plant ... coincidence ??? ( aliens observing our energy facilities ???) in all ... it was a mystery to each of us. i have written to you today about this incident because last week ... i happened to see a program on tv ... with your organization doing research and interviews with people about sightings they had recently in the area southwest of phoenix,arizona. these lights over phoenix ... looked exactly like the ones i had seen in new hampshire ... many years ago ... ??? coincidence ???
